data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Kashiwa at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 7, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kashiwa.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Kashiwa drive upfield and Ataru Esaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
In the minute 11, Yudai Yamamoto signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Naoki Maeda.
In the minute 14, Nagoya's Naoki Maeda looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 16, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Naoki Maeda for Nagoya gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
In the minute 21, Nagoya's Sho Inagaki breaks free at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Kashiwa.
Tatsuya Yamashita for Kashiwa has been booked by Yudai Yamamoto and receives a first yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mu Kanazaki for Nagoya who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Mu Kanazaki for Nagoya is back on the field again.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 27, Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Kosuke Nakamura (Kashiwa) has received a yellow card from Yudai Yamamoto.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
In the minute 32, Sho Inagaki (Nagoya) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 34, Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Throw-in Nagoya.

Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 36, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 38, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
Mu Kanazaki (Nagoya) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Kashiwa pushes forward through Ataru Esaka, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.

Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa's Hayato Nakama misses with an attempt on goal.

The first-half is over at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.

Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Nagoya have a goal kick.

Nagoya's Naoki Maeda gets his shot away but it misses the target.

Michael Olunga is on target to give Kashiwa a 0-1 advantage.
Great play from Hidekazu Otani to set up the goal.

Ryotaro Ishida is replacing Yuki Soma for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a third substitution, with Ryota Aoki replacing Mateus.

It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
